类 HateoasAwareSpringDataWebConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.web.config.SpringDataWebConfiguration
      • org.springframework.data.web.config.HateoasAwareSpringDataWebConfiguration
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanClassLoaderAware, WebMvcConfigurer

    @Configuration
public class HateoasAwareSpringDataWebConfiguration
extends SpringDataWebConfiguration
    JavaConfig class to register PagedResourcesAssembler and PagedResourcesAssemblerArgumentResolver.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.6

      • HateoasAwareSpringDataWebConfiguration

        public HateoasAwareSpringDataWebConfiguration(org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext context,
                                              @Qualifier(value="mvcConversionService")
                                              org.springframework.beans.factory.ObjectFactory<org.springframework.core.convert.ConversionService> conversionService)
        参数:
        context - must not be null.
        conversionService - must not be null.

      • addArgumentResolvers

        public void addArgumentResolvers(List<HandlerMethodArgumentResolver> argumentResolvers)
        从接口复制的说明: WebMvcConfigurer
        Add resolvers to support custom controller method argument types.

        This does not override the built-in support for resolving handler method arguments. To customize the built-in support for argument resolution, configure RequestMappingHandlerAdapter directly.

        指定者:
        addArgumentResolvers 在接口中 WebMvcConfigurer
        覆盖:
        addArgumentResolvers 在类中 SpringDataWebConfiguration
        参数:
        argumentResolvers - initially an empty list
